articles.title: live updates for June 16 2025
articles.description: China is slated to release a slew of data, including its retail sales and industrial output figures for May.

articles.title: Two Pinoy officer cadets finish training at Indian Military Academy
articles.description: Two Filipino officer cadets have successfully completed their pre-commissioning training at the Indian Military Academy Dehradun in the State of Uttarakhand.
articles.content:
Two Filipino officer cadets have successfully completed their pre-commissioning training at the Indian Military Academy (IMA) Dehradun in the State of Uttarakhand, the defense attaché of the Philippines in India said.

articles.title: Researchers make crucial discovery after studying more than 200,000 glaciers: 'Decisions we make now will determine the future'
articles.description: Research reveals that we must reduce the Earth's warming from 4.9 to 2.7 degrees Fahrenheit to protect our vanishing glaciers.
articles.content:
Many scientists have been tracking glaciers and raising concerns about the world's freshwater supply.
New research reveals that we must reduce the Earth's warming from 4.9 to 2.7 degrees Fahrenheit to protect our glaciers.

articles.description: The drivers and teams report back on all the action at the Circuit Gilles-Villeneuve in Montreal for the 2025 Canadian Grand Prix.
articles.content:

articles.description: The Boston Red Sox traded Rafael Devers to the San Francisco Giants on Sunday in a deal that could shake up pennant races on both coasts.

articles.title: NASA Teams Up With India to Launch First-of-Its-Kind $1.5 Billion Satellite
articles.description: In a few days, a new satellite that can detect changes on Earth's surface down to the centimetre, in almost real time and no matter the time of day or weather conditions, is set to launch from India's Satish Dhawan Space Centre near Chennai.
